nodes.name: bet

nodes.documentation:
@dev Check the betting result and distribute the pot money.
If both letters match, get the pot money (_pot).
If one letter match or chek is not possible, refund the betting money (BET_AMOUNT).
If both letters are not matched, accumulate the betting money into the pot money.
nodes.name: distribute

attributes.name: bet

attributes.documentation:
@dev Check the betting result and distribute the pot money.
If both letters match, get the pot money (_pot).
If one letter match or chek is not possible, refund the betting money (BET_AMOUNT).
If both letters are not matched, accumulate the betting money into the pot money.
attributes.name: distribute

bet(bytes1).details: Submit bet transaction. User must send 0.005 ETH and 1 byte string for betting. Then, the BetInfo is pushed to the queue (_bet). Distribute function process the BetInfo.

distribute().details: Check the betting result and distribute the pot money. If both letters match, get the pot money (_pot). If one letter match or chek is not possible, refund the betting money (BET_AMOUNT). If both letters are not matched, accumulate the betting money into the pot money.
